duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a wide range of Thoracic Surgery services in a medical institution's Central region, including shared service call, rounding, pre-op and post-op patient care, and consultation requests.
Support the expansion of the Thoracic Surgery program in other regions.
Participate in academic programs of the medical institution, including didactic teaching, resident training, preceptorship, and mentoring, or research programs.

education_certification.credential: Completed an ACGME-accredited Thoracic Surgery fellowship/residency program. Board-eligible or board certified in Thoracic Surgery.
